tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have Dr. Inamdar to thank for 2 separate occasions. Ten years ago, he operated on my sister for a benign cyst in her left heel. This was a very unusual case and my sister was suffering from intense pain. Sir was very systematic and performed bone grafting, filling in the cavity with bone fragments from her pelvic bone. Later xrays made it apparent that sir had done a fantastic job and no one would believe there ever was any cyst.That's why we went to sir again, this time for our mother's knee problems. Mom had fallen on one knee and had torn her ligaments. But she always suffered from intense knee pain. Mom was stubborn and didn't want to go through surgery, but with the careful analysis sir gave her, she saw reason. We were concerned since mom is obese and has high blood pressure but we didn't need to worry because she was in the best of hands. She was admitted to Apollo Jayanagar, where sir performed total knee replacement. The left knee was operated on Jan 3, and the right on Jan 6. Now, a month later, mom is walking well without any support. She even takes short strolls in the apartment park and she can climb up and down a single flight of stairs. In the months to come, we are sure that her progress will continue to be phenomenal.Sir's meticulous work is really inspiring. I have recommended him to several friends and colleagues and we will continue to visit him for all orthopaedic cases. He cares and explains everything so that everyone understand the healing process and the factors involved in the surgery.We are truly grateful for his support and advice.If you are considering any orthopedic related procedures, please contact him *** *** **** ******* *** **** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Deepak Inamdar performed TKR on both the knees of my mother about a year back. My mother is really happy and healthy post the operation and is now able to walk for 30 min without stopping and able to perform all her daily chores independently.

My mother, aged about 65 years, was almost bed ridden and was not even able to move even with walkers. Her life was miserable.
She was scared of the very thought of knee operation esp. when some of her friends shared stories of pain, swelling post operation and during physiotherapy.

That is when we met Dr. Deepak Inamdar in Jayanagar. He did diagnosis and explained the benefits of total knee replacement (TKR) surgery. He asked us to do couple of test to determine the suitability of operation. Based on test, he recommended couple of medications and asked to do some leg exercises while sitting down as prep for surgery. My mother’s all muscles were all gone and has no strength.

Doctor fixed the operation after 10 days and performed TKR on both knees within gap of 3 days. Total hospital time of 10 days and post that my mother was back on her feet. He recommended physiotherapy sessions which started from day 2 itself and continued for a month, post sutures removal. Doctor started making her walk from day 2 itself and within 15 days from operation, my mother was able to walk (slowly) without any support.

Pain management was excellent she never felt any pain thorough out the hospital stay and post that during physiotherapy. All our myths were dispelled and my mother was really surprised that how she went thru all of this with help of Dr. Inamdar.

I would also like to share that we were happy to see that doctor would always visit the patient and talk so cheerfully, encourage for the future and answer any questions/doubts we have. He even came to see the patient on the day of bangalore bandh esp. when I did not see any other doctor visiting their patients on that day. Kudos !

I would strongly recommend Dr.Deepak Inamdar if someone is planning to undergo Knee Replacement. The physiotherapy plan was also well designed to suit his age and condition.

Thank you so much Doctor.
reply_text: thank you hemant happy to know the knee replacements are helping her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother underwent the left knee replacement surgery on December 4,2019. Currently she walks normally & does day to day activities without any discomfort. It's been an end to end smooth sail process as my mom was in the right hands that's Dr.Inamdar. Certain key factors considered while consulting were:1)Clear communication about pre-tests, pre-operative measures, surgery process, post surgery pain mgmt & care, recovery process, risk factors, follow-ups, Insurance & cost mgmt.2)Doctor was accessible for any query regarding the surgery.3)One of the most important thing is that he is the single point of contact for consulting & surgery which plays a crucial role in building the trust & comfortability for the patient.The competence level in terms of technical proficiency(diagnosis/surgery), thoroughness, carefulness & the accountability of the doctor has been highly appreciated.Few other plus points has been the location, the facilities @the clinic & the ease of appointment.I would highly recommend the ortho patients to contact the doctor for treatment.
replier_name: Dr Deepak Inamdar's Orthopedic & Robotic Joint Replacement Center

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother aged about 63 years was suffering from knee pain and inability to walk for more than 10 years and was very skeptical about treatment.  We somehow managed to convince her for a checkup with an orthopaedic. ** ******** *** ****** ** *** **** *********** ******* ** ********* ****** *** were suggested to meet Dr. Inamdar, who comes from a great lineage of doctors in his family and were famous in Hospet-Ballari region for their medical abilities. When we consulted him, he suggested that she undergo bilateral knee replacement and managed to convince my mother that the surgery is going to be safe and convenient. After a month of presurgical care, surgery was completed on both knees with a day's interval.  My mother was noticed to be confident immediately after surgery and after a week, she slowly progressed to gait training with quad Walker and in a month's time progressed to walking stick. Now 3 months after surgery, she is able to walk normally and has resumed all her activities of daily living. Our hearty thanks to Dr. Inamdar for successful surgery and treatment. We would personally recommend him for any bone and joint related ailments.
reply_text: thank you happy to know the knee replacement surgeries are helping her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My father is 68 years old and was suffering from Knee problem for past 15 years and the pain aggregated in last 5 years. We got to Dr.Deepak through one of my friends and visited him. Dr. Deepak is very humble and clarified all our doubts about the surgery and gave good details about it.

We went with robotic based surgery for both knees at apollo hospital. Doctor was informing us on every details about the surgery and the process, we were upto date. We took admission on Apr 26th, left leg operation was done on Apr 27th and right leg operation was done on Apr 29th. My father walked with support of walker after the surgery. Due to the utmost care by the doctor, my father had very less pain post surgery.

The best part is seeing my father walk and handle things. It's been 3 months and my dad is far better than before. He is able to walk for long on his own.

All the credit goes to Dr.Deepak. Thanks sir!
reply_text: thank you so much happy for you satya
replier_name: Dr Deepak Inamdar's Orthopedic & Robotic Joint Replacement Center

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Inamdar was very professional and courteous. He operated on my mother in law when she had a fracture of he forearm. She coordinated well with his physician colleagues and the surgery was carried out without delay. He promptly attended to all our calls and was consistently patient, but reassuring. She was discharged home last week and is recovering well. The post discharge care and guidance has been excellent. We cannot thank him enough for all that he has done to us. I would wholeheartedly recommend him to our friends and family members.
reply_text: thanks murali happy mom is doing well after fracture surgery
replier_name: Dr Deepak Inamdar's Orthopedic & Robotic Joint Replacement Center

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had consulted for my ACL tear. I've been managing this for 5years as was skeptical about surgery due to some of the cases I've seen with my friends. However after consulting Dr. Deepak, he gave me the confidence to go for the surgery and also explained the post operation care. Therefore I did go for the surgery; I was truly amazed at the pace of recovery and support I received. I also rode my bike to the Himalayas within 6months of the surgery which was truly amazing and I had zero issues post that.
I definitely would recommend Dr. Deepak and let me tell you that you are in safe hands.
replier_name: Dr Deepak Inamdar's Orthopedic & Robotic Joint Replacement Center

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Suffered a rotator cuff injury after a fall to my right shoulder and my quality of life suffered due to the excruciating pain and even a simple work with my right hand was a task for me and I started gradually losing confidence in myself.  Dr. Deepak Inamdar performed an arthroscopic surgery for my shoulder and got a new lease of life.  I have gained back the confidence and started to gain control over my life.  His diagnosis is accurate, he has maximum patience to explain even the minute details and post surgical care is unmatched.  I am into the 4th week of my surgery and recovering well.  He is caring, understanding and sensitive to the patient's needs and treats them to alleviate their suffering.  Thank you doctor.
replier_name: Dr Deepak Inamdar's Orthopedic & Robotic Joint Replacement Center

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My wife Malini, had severe neck and shoulder pain radiating to hands with lots of swelling and even numbness.  We met Dr. Deepak Inamdar and immediately he diagnosed the root cause and asked us to take an x-ray. By the time the x-ray was ready he had already penned down the prescription of all the medicines, physio-therapy needs etc.  The x-ray revealed exactly as he had diagnosed the problem. My wife took physiotherapy with Dr. Aiswarya who is also available at the clinic.  Dr. Aiswarya a smart young girl could nicely explain what care needs to be taken for this problem and also taught and ensured that what is taught was practiced.
 Dr. Deepak Inamdar is highly professional, humble and talks nicely to the patient and clarifies all our doubts. He has an air of confidence and human touch which makes the patients to relax and further comforts towards getting cured.
My wife is relieved of the pain and the Dr. on followup has prescribed one more medicine for better joint lubricity.
reply_text: thank you happy to be of help
replier_name: Dr Deepak Inamdar's Orthopedic & Robotic Joint Replacement Center

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr Deepak Inamdar is very professional, friendly and kind person. I had been for heel spur surgery, I lost all hope to continue play football because other doctors said you can’t play or run after surgery. My cousin recommended Deepak Inamdar so he said he will do it and he did it in simple manner and it worked. It feels like miracle I can play football or run without pain now. He is like god for me now.
He treats us as if we are one of their family member.
Answers every doubts and clears it.
Only thing is he writes expensive medicines which is good for better treatment. I recommended him to family and friends and they are happy with his treatment.

review: I went to Dr.Deepak with intense pain in my lower back and I could hardly walk. He diagnosed my injury and gave me medication that brought my pain down in a few days. He also recommended physiotherapy that was available at his clinic. Physiotherapy sessions with Miss Aishwarya helped and I was able to walk for short distances. With rest and exercises I should be back to my normal activities. Both Dr. Deepak and Miss Aishwarya are very professional and give good explanations of the injury and treatment needed.
replier_name: Dr Deepak Inamdar's Orthopedic & Robotic Joint Replacement Center

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very happy with the doctor

Visited for Fracture Treatment

My Mom had a Major ankle fracture on her left Ankel. Dr. Deepak N Inamdar explained problem very well & accordingly examine the patient. Explains everything in simple language as layman can easily understand.

We have full confidence in his diagnosis and treatment. He didn't ask us to get any expensive tests done. He is qualified, insightful & imparts sufficient time to the patient & family. Follow up appointments are given due attention too.

Definitely I will recommend to anyone who is having problems regarding orthopedic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Consulted Dr Deepak for myself and my husband following an accident on the 3 rd of June.My husband suffered a fracture fibula and required surgery with implant to fix it. And the procedure and recovery has been going really well. I had to have Arthroscopy and ACL reconstruction with PCL repair as well. And am recovering really well two months post op now.we are really priveledges to have met Dr Deepak who was not only a very experienced and efficient surgeon but also friendly and reassuring in explaining everything to us and making us feel  confident in our recovery! And are ever do grateful to him .we would without a doubt recommend anyone requiring orthopaedic treatment to please contact Dr Deepak for the best treatment in this field.Thank u so much Dr for all Ur care and support and your friendly nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Inamdar treated my father for his knee pain. From the outset the care provided by him was transparent , procedure and waiting period clearly explained. 
The surgery was carried out at Apollo hospital. The standard of care was top notch. He diligently followed up post surgery and appropriate rehabilitation was organised by his team.
My dad is very happy with the outcome of the surgery and he is doing extremely well 1 year following the surgery.
I would highly recommend him, with my professional background as a sports physician in the United Kingdom.
reply_text: thank you so much dr naveen - for trusting me with your father s knee replacement surgery - with you being an esteemed  orthopedic doctor in UK ,am humbled

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Deepak Inamdar a thorough professional & an excellent human being. He was instrumental in getting my son back on track after suffering multiple injuries from a fatal road accident. His guidance & moral support to family was extremely crucial,. Dr Deepak will always be in our prayers, we wish him the very best in his career & good health in continuing to serve the mankind 🙏 I am a resident of Trivandrum and got Dr Deepak Inamdar’s reference from one of my doctor friends. Based on my experience I would highly recommend Dr Deepak Inamdar.
reply_text: thank you so much so happy your son is back on his feet -humbled

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had an Bike accident on a Sunday Morning. Due to high pain on my right hand reached out to Doctor Deepak Inamdar.
Dr Deepak was courteous enough to talk to me and advised me to take an X-Ray based on the information he collected from me. Based on X-Rays Dr. Deepak indicated that there are multiple fractures in the right hand and an urgent surgery was required. 
Dr Deepak took personal interest and care, got me admitted to Apollo, Jayanagar and also made sure to get the next day's first OT slot for operation. Dr Deepak did take time, took all questions smiling and did explain the situation and advised post operation care to me and my family.
To summarize Dr. Deepak was friendly and approachable all along. While he was sensitive with care to the patent, he was also showing empathy to the family and was providing friendly advise to family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My son aged 14 fell and suffered a fracture of his forearm.  It was a bad experience seeing our son with broken bones and in so much pain, the experience made bad by how badly it was handled at the first hospital we took him.  It was then that we took him to Dr. Inamdar after talking to whom we were immensely reassured, putting us at ease with a clear plan to manage the fracture. My son has now undergo the surgery and is recovering really well.  We are happy to see him resume his usual activities with some limitations to sports activities.  We found Dr. Inamdar really very approachable and friendly, answering all our queries to our satisfaction.  We knew our son was in competent hands and the results are there for us to see.  We are very happy with Dr. Inamdar and we highly recommend him in his field of expertise.  Thank you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Wow Dr.deepak wat an amazing doctor 🙏 so friendly and perfect at his work ...
He operated my mother-in-law 'Asha' .. she was in pain from 17+ long years and was scared to get the Operation done ...but just one meeting with dr.deepak changed her mind ..doctor explained everything in such a way tat she was ready for the Operation n in a months time she got operated.. now it's 6 weeks and she is walking without any support... tat is Dr. Deepak 😊 The Best orthopedic surgeon whom I have seen. ... People he is the doctor who can change life's ..so I recommend him today and always ☺️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Deepak is extremely friendly and my father likes him a lot. Since the first day when we met him to discuss my father's knee surgery to this date when my father has fully recovered and can perform all tasks with ease. Doctor explained the entire issue and surgery process in detail and was always there to help with doubts and queries. He evaluated all my father's reports and then only suggested the way forward. We were lucky to have his advice all along and would highly recommend him. Thanks Doctor Deepak.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a knee pain since March 2017 for which i was consulting at Sakra World Hospital. The condition was same till August 2018 after going through many x-rays, MRI scan and number of physio sessions. Then i consulted Dr Deepak Inamdar in Oct 2018. I was happy to meet him in the first instance as he has time to talk to you about the problems. He explained me the causes and future course of action in the first visit. And in just 4 months on the third visit in Feb 2019 my pain is reduced by more than 75%. The pain which i had 24/7 is now reduced to some of the days only. I am relieved from the pain and happy to met him and refer him for best and speedy treatment. Visit the doc at Orthone Jayanar. He will talk with you in detail about your problems.

tags: None
review: Doctor is very friendly and humble . Treatment is very good . I have heel pain but after the treatment it's completely gone .

review: ** ** * *** ****** * **** **** *** * * ******* ******* ** **** ** ****** ** ******* * ****** * ** ************ told to get xray's dne .. wic he has set up in his clinic & det costed around 2600 . ****** ********* ** ** **** *** *** ********* ***& moreover he gave a lecture * **** ** **** * ********* * ** **** ** ****** ** ** ** **** ****** ** **  ******* ** * *** **** * ***** **** ** ******** ************ *** ******** **** ** *** * ** ******* ** **** ** **** ***** ******* *** ** * ** ***** ** ** **** **** * ***** **** **** **** * * . he should motivate his patients toward positive attitude instead demotivating them . . as first itself they r going through so much pain and stress.& (for the icing on d cake😛 ) He gave me a prescription full of tablets and capsules wich on first hand i had to buy from his selected chemist shop, as he gave me their visitng card n guided me to d shop. n dos tablets and capsules costed me 4700 . * ***** ** * *** **** ******** ** **** **** * *** *** * ***** ******* ***** * ********* ******** ******* ******** ********* ****** ** **** * **** *********** * * *** *** ** * **** ******* ** ** **** ***** **** *** ****** **** *** ** * *** *** ********* * **** **** *** ******** **** * ******* **** ******* ** ** *** **finally i had to meet my old family doctor, who was not available on first hand due to lockdwn restrictions . .

review:
Last year in December I underwent my ACL reconstruction surgery, I had twisted my knee and tore my ACL. After consulting around 6 Doctors I visited Dr Deepak. In the first visit I decided he is the right person for this surgery. The surgery and the after treatment and support and his Physiotherapist were all really helpfull for my recovery. Exactly after one year I had been on a bike ride in my Thunderbird to Kolli hills which is around 300km from Bangalore. This was my first ride after the surgery, the feeling was amazing. And I have also started playing badminton.
Thank you Dr Deepak 🙏😊
Wish you Marry Christmas and Happy New year.
